trans-unit.source: Relays workflow instance creation, execution and termination events to the debugger process.
trans-unit.target: 将中继到调试器进程工作流实例创建、 执行和终止事件。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] An instance of this class runs in the workflow host application.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]工作流宿主应用程序中运行的此类的实例。

trans-unit.source: It is created by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> if workflow debugging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 它由创建<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>如果启用工作流调试。</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime>

trans-unit.source: Establishes the communication channel between the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController"></xref> object running in the workflow host application and the debugger process.
trans-unit.target: 建立之间的通信通道<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController"></xref>在工作流主机应用程序和调试器进程中运行的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> of the remoting object running in the debugger process with which the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController"></xref> communicates.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Uri>与其的调试器进程中运行的远程处理对象<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController"></xref>进行通信。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Establishes a lifetime lease for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立生存期租约的<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The return value is set to `null` unless this method is overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 返回的值设置为`null`除非在派生类中重写此方法。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that implements <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease"></xref> and is used to control the lifetime policy for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>实现<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease"></xref>以及用于控制的生存期策略<xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController"></xref>对象。</xref:System.Object>
